## Variables

### Types of variables

*   Continuous or discrete or qualitative variables
*   Binary variables
*   Flow and stock variables

### Encoding

*   Binary
*   Numeric
*   String (text)
*   Categorical / Factor (can be ordered)

### Meaning of variable values

*   What it measures
*   Unit of measurement
*   Source

### Other information

*   Descriptive statistics
*   Coverage / share of missing values
